letters.subject: Meeting Reminder
letters.body: Don't forget about our meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.

letters.subject: Project Update
letters.body: The project is progressing well. Expect completion by next month.
letters.footnote: More details in the next meeting.

letters.subject: Invitation to Conference
letters.body: You are invited to our annual conference on April 15th.
We are pleased to offer you the position of Software Engineer.
letters.footnote: Please review the contract and respond by next week.
